pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 25, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, September 25, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Gateway Conference Marketplace with the Executive Chairman of Alibaba Group, Jack Ma.

Enercare Centre
100 Princes’ Boulevard

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media should register at the following link:  http://www.cvent.com/d/j5qgtb/4W
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:15 a.m.

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Gateway Conference and will participate in a Q & A with Jack Ma.

Enercare Centre
100 Princes’ Boulevard

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Media should register at the following link:  http://www.cvent.com/d/j5qgtb/4W
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:45 a.m.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Media Centre
Enercare Centre
100 Princes’ Boulevard

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Executive Chairman of Alibaba Group, Jack Ma.

Enercare Centre
100 Princes’ Boulevard

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
